title: NewsBreak: Crude Inventories Jump 10.5M, API Data Shows
text:
NewsBreak: Crude Inventories Jump 10.5M, API Data Shows

Commodities 2 hours ago (Oct 16, 2019 04:51PM ET)

© Reuters. Investing.com - stockpiles rose sharply last week, according to an estimate from the American Petroleum Institute released Wednesday. The API said rose by 10.5 million for the week ended Oct. 11. Analysts expect that the Energy Information Administration will report a build of 2.88 million barrels when it reports numbers tomorrow morning. The EIA are due at 10:30 AM ET (14:30 GMT). WTI futures were up 0.4% at $53.02 following the release, after settling up 1% today in regular trading.

NewsBreak: Crude Inventories Jump 10.5M, API Data Shows
